name: Sarah Chen
story: A 28-year-old graphic designer who needs urgent heart surgery to repair a congenital valve defect that's affecting her ability to work and care for her family.

name: Marcus Johnson
story: A 45-year-old factory worker who suffered severe burns in an industrial accident and needs multiple reconstructive surgeries to regain full mobility.

name: Aiden Rodriguez
story: A 12-year-old boy with a rare bone cancer who needs specialized treatment at a children's hospital to have the best chance of recovery.

name: David Kim
story: A 38-year-old teacher who needs emergency kidney transplant surgery after his kidney function rapidly deteriorated due to a genetic condition.

name: Emma Thompson
story: A 32-year-old single mother who needs spinal surgery to treat a herniated disc that's preventing her from working and supporting her children.

name: Robert Martinez
story: A 52-year-old construction worker who needs urgent surgery to repair multiple fractures from a fall at work, as his family depends on his income.

name: Lisa Wang
story: A 29-year-old nurse who was diagnosed with a brain tumor and needs immediate surgery to prevent permanent neurological damage.

name: Eleanor Davis
story: A 67-year-old grandmother who needs cataract surgery to regain her sight so she can continue caring for her disabled grandson.
